channel.title: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?
channel.description:
I've posted this problem before on both Mopar and Rune-Server and either no one knows, or no one is willing to help.
I really need some help and hopefully this time I can get an answer.
I've added some custom shops and for some reason I can't buy items from them. The NPC is there, I'm able to trade it and view what's inside of the shop, view how much it costs, though I can't buy the items, even if I have coins in my inventory. How do I fix this? Some people have said it has something to do with shopAssistant.java, something about I need to make it so the shop accepts currency or something, but I'm not exactly sure HOW to do that. Please help me!

item.title: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Could it have anything to do with this?

if (c.myShopId == 15) { c.sendMessage("This item current costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins."); return; } if (c.myShopId == 47) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": current costs "+pkPts+"("+c.pkPoints+") pk points."); return; } if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)"; } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)"; } c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }

I honestly don’t know what I’m looking for.

Read full topic

@Amayzing wrote:

I Vain I:

Its your ShopAssistant then.

I know but what exactly do I need to do in shopAssistant.java, that’s what I’m trying to figure out.

At least three people have told me the solution is in shopAssistant.java, though none have told me exactly what I need to do.

shop = 29	Potion Store	2	2	113	50	2432	50	2428	50	2446	50	2434	50

It’s really weird. :\

item.title: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I just need to know the first two parameters in the shop configuration.

shop = ID    name    parameter1    parameter2    items....

They’re set to 2, both of them. Here’s an example of one of my shops that is working.

shop = 5	Weapon Store	2	2	1323	200	1325	200	1327	200	1329	200	1331	200	1333	200	1309	200	1311	200	1313	200	1315	200	1317	200	1319	200	1203	200	1207	200	1217	200	1209	2000	1211	200	1213	200

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?

item.title: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

[quote=“xocean, post:4, topic:374100”]Src/Server/Model/Players

ActionHandler.Java

case 520: c.getShops().openShop(11); break;

What is case 520:? Case 520 is the Npc Id change that to whatever npc you want to be able to sell items.

What is (11) ? 11 is the shop ID.

Once you’ve added that and picked your shop id etc.

Go to Data/Cfg/Shops

Shops.java

shop = 11	Store		2	2

‘11’ is the Shop id.

When added this, simply add the item codes and amount you want for example i want to add

whip - 100 and ags 100

it’d look like this.

shop = 11	Store		2	2	4151 	100	11694	100

Should be able to work that out i basically spoonfeed you…[/quote]

Oh really, you spoon fed me? Well you spoon fed me shit that I already knew. Read the freaking thread before posting.

Sure thing I Vain I, I’ll post it here or send it to you as soon as possible.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?

item.title: [PI] Can't buy from shops, how do I make a shop sell items?
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Src/Server/Model/Players

ActionHandler.Java

case 520: c.getShops().openShop(11); break;

What is case 520:? Case 520 is the Npc Id change that to whatever npc you want to be able to sell items.

What is (11) ? 11 is the shop ID.

Once you’ve added that and picked your shop id etc.

Go to Data/Cfg/Shops

Shops.java

shop = 11	Store		2	2

‘11’ is the Shop id.

When added this, simply add the item codes and amount you want for example i want to add

whip - 100 and ags 100

it’d look like this.

shop = 11	Store		2	2	4151 	100	11694	100

Should be able to work that out i basically spoonfeed you…

Read full topic
